name: matrix-block-mini20-web
description: MATRIXblock software for Mini 2.0 Series web
author: MATRIX ROBOTICS
copyright: 2024 Â© MATRIX ROBOTICS All Rights Reserved.

scripts.compile: npx google-closure-compiler src/core/MyAPP.js src/core/editor-main.js src/core/editor-block.js src/core/code.js src/core/home.js src/app.js --js_output_file app.bundle.js
scripts.obfusecate: javascript-obfuscator app.bundle.js --output app.compressed.js --compact true --identifier-names-generator hexadecimal --rename-globals true --options-preset medium-obfuscation --simplify true --string-array true --string-array-rotate true --string-array-shuffle true --target browser --transform-object-keys true --identifiers-prefix of_
